alert.note: Alert for Iberia; Lower St. Martin; St. Mary (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 5:21PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Iberia and northwestern St. Mary Parishes through 600 PM CDT... At 521 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Fausse Pointe, or near Jeanerette, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Iberia, Franklin, Jeanerette, Baldwin, Loreauville, Sorrel, Lydia, Lake Fausse Pointe and Charenton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Iberia; Lower St. Martin; St. Mary
